name: Stactory 0.1
description:
Goal:

Get all the bananas going into the hole.

Keys:

Right mouse: Enable/Disable camera free fly WSAD move the camera during free fly

Left mouse: Hold to drag

R - Rotate

G - Gear

Arrow up - Increase Speed

Arrow down - Decrease Speed

H - Dev mode: L - Lock/Unlock selected.  Del - delete selected
